title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 975.5 - Uniform system of accounts for corporation or individuals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 975.5 - Uniform system of accounts for corporation or individuals

State Regulations

Any person, firm or corporation providing mass
transportation services and receiving assistance, pursuant to section
18-b
of the

Transportation Law shall maintain its accounting records in compliance with the
uniform system of accounts for bus corporations as prescribed by the

Commissioner of Transportation and contained in Article 7 of Subchapter D of

Chapter VI of this Title (Parts 760 through 777), and/or such other accounting
standards as determined by the Commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
975.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
